title: 3x2 Apartments Throughout August! Reserve NOW!
posting_body: Milan Apartment Townhomes are ideally positioned in the best submarket of Las Vegas: Silverado Ranch/Henderson.
Our one, two, and three bedroom townhomes are between the affluent residential neighborhood of Seven Hills and downtown Las Vegas.

Residents of Milan enjoy convenient access to the entire Las Vegas Valley by way of the I-215 Beltway, which delivers rapid ingress to McCarran International Airport, the I-15, and the employment center better known as the "Strip."
Milan combines the convenience of city living with the comfort and security of homeownership.
Standard features include attached garages, washer/dryers, vaulted ceilings, walk-in closets, soaking tubs, and complete appliance packages.
Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1191 Sq.
- Granite Kitchen Countertops and Moen Kitchen/Bathroom Faucets
- 1 and 2 Car Direct Access Attached Garages (2 and 3 bedrooms)
- Pre Wired for Electronic Intrusion Alarm Systems
- Full Size Super Capacity GE Washers and Dryers
- Corian Bath Vanities, Oversized Garden Tubs and Separate Shower Stall
- 9-Foot Ceilings (1st floor) or Vaulted Ceilings (2nd floor)
- Clubhouse featuring a kitchen, fireplace, and cyber café with free WiFi
Pets - allowed, Rent $30, Deposit $250 (refundable) Pet fee $250
875 East Silverado Ranch Blvd, Silverado Ranch, NV, 89183
